name: Husk

skills.name: Burning Iron
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 20% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn.

effects.notes: 2-hit single target. 2.8x ATK per hit = 5.6 ATK total base (6.16 ATK fully booked with +10% damage).
20% base chance (40% booked) to place Provoke for 1 turn. Provoke forces enemy to target Husk with A1 only (control mechanic).

skills.book_value: Medium: +10% damage, +20% Provoke chance (20%→40%). Decent for Provoke uptime.
skills.notes: 2-hit A1 (triggers Giant Slayer 2x). 40% Provoke chance when booked. Provoke forces enemy A1 attacks on Husk (good for tanking).

skills.name: Despair
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 35% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn.

effects.notes: AoE attack. 0.1x ENEMY MAX HP damage multiplier (10% enemy MAX HP base damage). Ignores DEF stat. EXCELLENT for high HP bosses and tanky enemies. At 1M boss HP: 100K base damage.
35% base chance (60% booked) to place Stun for 1 turn. AoE Stun for crowd control. Requires ACC to land.

skills.book_value: CRITICAL: +25% Stun chance (35%→60%), -1 cooldown (5→4). Must book for Stun uptime and MAX HP damage frequency.
skills.notes: PRIMARY NUKE: AoE 10% enemy MAX HP damage (ignores DEF). EXCELLENT for bosses and tanky enemies (e.g., Doom Tower, Faction Wars bosses). 60% Stun chance when booked. Must book for 4-turn cooldown.

skills.name: Retaliate
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Damage increases according to this Champion's current HP.

effects.notes: Single-hit. 0.33x CURRENT HP multiplier (0.4 HP fully booked with +20% damage). Scales with Husk's CURRENT HP (not MAX HP - damage decreases as Husk takes damage). At 60K HP: 19.8K base damage (24K booked).

skills.book_value: Medium: +20% damage, -1 cooldown (4→3). Useful for HP-scaling nuke but damage decreases as HP drops.
skills.notes: HP-scaling nuke (0.33x CURRENT HP base, 0.4x booked). Damage decreases as Husk takes damage. Best used early in fight at full HP. Build 60000+ HP for max damage.

skills.name: Tempered [P]
skills.description: Heals this Champion by 10% of their MAX HP at the start of each turn.

effects.notes: Passive self-heal. 10% MAX HP per turn start. At 60K HP: 6K heal per turn. Excellent for sustain and maintaining A3 damage (CURRENT HP scaling).

skills.notes: Self-heal passive. 10% MAX HP per turn start. Excellent sustain for tanking. Synergizes with A3 CURRENT HP scaling (maintains damage output by keeping HP high).

forms.aura: Increases Ally HP in the Arena by 30%.
forms.comments: HP-based tank with enemy MAX HP nuke. A2 'Despair' deals 10% enemy MAX HP AoE damage (excellent for bosses). A3 'Retaliate' scales with CURRENT HP (damage decreases as HP drops). Passive self-heal (10% MAX HP/turn) maintains HP for A3 damage. Good for Knight Revenant Faction Wars (8/10) and Doom Tower (7/10) boss killing. +30% HP Arena aura good for tanky Arena teams.

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: Low priority. If used: 60000+ HP (A3 damage), 200+ ACC (Stun/Provoke), 180+ SPD, 100% C.RATE, 200%+ C.DMG. A2 MAX HP damage weak on CB (low boss MAX HP damage cap). 5/10 CB rating.
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: PRIORITY: 60000+ HP (A3 damage + survivability), 200+ ACC (Stun/Provoke), 180+ SPD, 100% C.RATE, 200%+ C.DMG. A2 MAX HP damage excellent for high HP waves (e.g., Dragon, Ice Golem). Immortal or Regen sets for sustain.
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: 60000+ HP (A3 damage + survivability), 200+ ACC (Stun/Provoke), 200+ SPD (speed tuning), 100% C.RATE, 200%+ C.DMG. +30% HP Arena aura good for tanky teams. Not top-tier for Arena (6/10) but usable.
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: PRIORITY: 60000+ HP (A3 damage + survivability), 200+ ACC (Stun CRITICAL for boss waves + Provoke), 180+ SPD, 100% C.RATE, 200%+ C.DMG. A2 MAX HP damage excellent for boss killing. Passive self-heal sustains through waves. Must book A2 for 60% Stun chance.

recommended_gear: Immortal (HP + sustain synergy with passive heal)

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Not a cheese champion. Solid HP-based tank + boss killer for Faction Wars and Doom Tower.
